com.box.boxandroidlibv2.manager

Class ThumbnailManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.box.boxandroidlibv2.manager.ThumbnailManager

  • public class ThumbnailManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages thumbnails to display to users. This class does not do network calls.

                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        cacheDirectory - a file representing the directory to store thumbnail images.

        boxItem - the BoxItem used to set the view.

        Returns:
